attributes.action: NICE Please review the decision not too recommend the use of Abiraterone before Chemotherapy for Prostate Cancer
attributes.additional_details: The use of Abiraterone prior to chemo has been seeing levels of cancer drop to less than 0.1 i.e. undetectable. NICE are not reconnecting it due to the cost. There must be a way to work out a better price with the manufacturer Janssen. It is not ok to sentence people to death because of cost, especially when we see taxpayers money misused so frequently.
